mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(goi.acount),0) AS buysum FROM t_goods_order_info goi WHERE goi.goods_id=#{goodsId}

SELECT tgoi.u_id, tgoi.order_id, tgoi.goods_name, tgoi.acount, tgoi.price, t_goods_order.submit_time, t_goods_order.order_status, t_goods_info_spec.size, t_goods_info_spec.color, t_shop.shop_name, s_user.username FROM t_goods_order_info tgoi JOIN t_goods_order ON t_goods_order.u_id=tgoi.order_id JOIN t_goods_info_spec ON t_goods_info_spec.u_id=tgoi.goods_spec JOIN t_shop ON t_shop.u_id = (SELECT tgo.shop_id FROM t_goods_order tgo WHERE tgo.u_id=tgoi.order_id) JOIN s_user ON s_user.u_id=(SELECT t_goods_order.user_id FROM t_goods_order WHERE t_goods_order.u_id=tgoi.order_id )

SELECT tgoi.u_id, tgoi.order_id, tgoi.goods_name, tgoi.acount, tgoi.price, t_goods_order.submit_time, t_goods_order.order_status, t_goods_info_spec.size, t_goods_info_spec.color, t_shop.shop_name, s_user.username FROM t_goods_order_info tgoi JOIN t_goods_order ON t_goods_order.u_id=tgoi.order_id JOIN t_goods_info_spec ON t_goods_info_spec.u_id=tgoi.goods_spec JOIN t_shop ON t_shop.u_id = (SELECT tgo.shop_id FROM t_goods_order tgo WHERE tgo.u_id=tgoi.order_id) JOIN s_user ON s_user.u_id=(SELECT t_goods_order.user_id FROM t_goods_order WHERE t_goods_order.u_id=tgoi.order_id ) limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT tgo.u_id, tgo.total_price, tgo.order_status, t_goods_order_info.goods_name, t_goods_order_info.acount, t_goods_order_info.goods_id, t_goods_order_info.order_id, t_goods_info_spec.color, t_goods_info_spec.size, t_shop.shop_name FROM t_goods_order tgo JOIN t_goods_order_info ON t_goods_order_info.order_id = tgo.u_id JOIN t_goods_info_spec ON t_goods_order_info.goods_spec = t_goods_info_spec.u_id JOIN t_shop ON t_shop.u_id = ( SELECT tgo.shop_id FROM t_goods_order tgo WHERE tgo.u_id = t_goods_order_info.order_id ) WHERE tgo.user_id=#{userId} limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT tgo.u_id, tgo.total_price, tgo.order_status, t_goods_order_info.goods_name, t_goods_order_info.acount, t_goods_order_info.goods_id, t_goods_order_info.order_id, t_goods_info_spec.color, t_goods_info_spec.size, t_shop.shop_name FROM t_goods_order tgo JOIN t_goods_order_info ON t_goods_order_info.order_id = tgo.u_id JOIN t_goods_info_spec ON t_goods_order_info.goods_spec = t_goods_info_spec.u_id JOIN t_shop ON t_shop.u_id = ( SELECT tgo.shop_id FROM t_goods_order tgo WHERE tgo.u_id = t_goods_order_info.order_id ) WHERE tgo.user_id=#{userId} and tgo.order_status=#{orderStatus} limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT tgo.shop_id shopId, tgo.total_price, tgo.order_status, tgo.pay_type, t_goods_order_info.goods_name, t_goods_order_info.acount, t_goods_order_info.goods_id, t_goods_order_info.order_id, t_goods_order_info.link_name, t_goods_order_info.link_tel, t_goods_order_info.link_address, t_goods_order_info.gmt_delivery, t_goods_order_info.refund_status, t_goods_order_info.gmt_modify, t_goods_order_info.gmt_refund, t_goods_info_spec.color, t_goods_info_spec.size, t_shop.shop_name, t_user_info.name username FROM t_goods_order tgo JOIN t_goods_order_info ON t_goods_order_info.order_id = tgo.u_id JOIN t_goods_info_spec ON t_goods_order_info.goods_spec = t_goods_info_spec.u_id JOIN t_user_info ON t_user_info.user_id=tgo.user_id JOIN t_shop ON t_shop.u_id = ( SELECT tgo.shop_id FROM t_goods_order tgo WHERE tgo.u_id = t_goods_order_info.order_id ) WHERE tgo.u_id=#{orderId}

SELECT sr.md5 FROM s_resources sr WHERE sr.u_id = ( SELECT t_metadata_rel.data_id FROM t_metadata_rel WHERE t_metadata_rel.record_id = ( SELECT t_goods_info.img_id FROM t_goods_info WHERE t_goods_info.u_id = #{goodsId} ) LIMIT 0,1 )
